TopicTitle: [FORUM SUGGESTION] Maybe change the way things are searched?

Articles.Content:
I just had a suggestion for these forums: maybe change how the search tab works? Say i wanted to search for a mod, like the kethane mod. If i typed in "the kethane mod" in the search tab and searched it, i would get a list of random threads that had almost nothing to do with kethane (for some reason, the interstellar mod is almost always on this list, i dont know why). However if i go to advanced search and click "search titles only" i get lots of examples related to kethane.

I was just thinking that maybe it would be better to have "search titles only" as the default when using the search tab. is there a way any moderators do this?

just my two cents

oh and P.S. im sorry if this thread is in the wrong place. i thought the forum forum would be the best place to put it, but im not sure if i should have put it in suggestions or not.

It's an issue that's been brought up in the past a few times. For now, I'd advise just using the Advanced Search option whenever you need to find something, as that gives you much more control over the results you want displayed.
